lines.text:
[dictating the end of a letter to the Queen]
Hey Eddie, SWALK
SWALK?
Sealed With a Loving Kiss
Well what about NORWICH?
Sealed with a loving Norwich?
Nah, nah. Knockers Out Ready When I Come Home
Yeah, but shouldn't Knockers be spelt with a K?
Knorwich?
Of Course! I'm so stupid! That must be where the soup comes from. God I love that advert; 'K-norr! They've got the K-know-how!'
Yea, what they really k-need is a good k-nick up the k-nackers.
[pause]

[ad-libs]
Got it! Oxford United!
Oxford United? Oh, that's a new one Eddie
Yes, give me a second

[taunting]
yes, come on, O-X-F
Yes, I thought I had it a minute ago
Yes, tick tock, tick tock...
Yes, here it comes... OI! Xylophone Fancying Old Regina, Deserves Unusual Nine-Inch Todger. Excited Darling?
[Eddie with his pistol walks up to the parrot in its cage]

I know what you're thinking parrot. You're thinking how many shots did I fire back there in Act 2, Scene 1? Well to tell you the truth in all the excitement of Richie forgetting his fucking lines, I've kind of forgotten myself. So, Parrot, do you feel lucky? Come on, make my day
You already fired six you big fat bastard
That's right!
[Shoots the parrot six times]
But I fucking reloaded!
The Queen?
Yes, and stand up when you say that.

[stands up]
The Queen?
Yes, and kneel down when you say that.

[kneels down]
It's no wonder why she's so fucking unpopular.
Fuck the Queen!
Who said that?
It was me, penis breath!

[to Eddie]
Eddie, have you been teaching the vicar's parrot to swear?
What that vicar needs is a good, hard, stiff cock right up his arse!
[in prison]
That's Geoffrey Nasty, the Psychopathic Penis-Remover.
Ooh! What's he in for?
...Removing penises!

[tries slamming a door shut several times, but it always opens. He points and talks to it]
Listen you, you're just a door. I'm Rik fucking Mayall!
[slams it shut]
I don't believe it! We've won the Lottery!

[returns through the window]
We've what?
Oh you're back aren't you? Oh yes, on sniff of ginger and your knickers are around your ankles
Still talking bollocks, that's my twat
[pats Richie on the back]
Is it? What's it doing on my back? It's feeling all sticky!
What were the charges again?

Attempted asphyxiation of the entire population of West London, detonation 400lbs of Semtex under contravention of the Anti-Terrorist act. Attempted regicide, Arson, causing an affray, and wiggling our todgers at the Queen.
So, its a first offence. I mean talk about Draconian!
I can't, I dunno what it means.
So Eddie, what's the rollover Jackpot figure for this week?
One pound.
ONE BLODDY PPpppppffffff... pound?

Yes, you see the fiendish flaw in our masterplan was, that being the only people who read, or have ever read, the Hammersmith Bugle, we were of course the only people who'd buy a fucking Lottery ticket!
One pound?
...ish. You see, after Admin costs, and a donation to charity, we ctually only come out with 5p. And we've just 10p on the phonecall finding that out.
So having won, we're now 5 pence down on the deal?
Yes that's right, well done.
Well, its a result Eddie!
Yes! yes it's er... it's a crap result!
Hey, my Great Uncle was in the Great War
What do mean 'Great War', there aren't any great wars, they're all frightful
Alright he was in the crap war!
Wow! The crap war! Far out! Which side was he on?
Both
Wow!
Well it depended on which diretion he was facing at the time y'know. Had an incy wincy little bit of a drink problem. He took out a machine-gun nest single-handly!
Did he?
But they made him bring it back, he was trying to flog it to the Germans
Hey, wasn't he the last bloke shot before the Armistace?
Yes, that's right. Just fired off a few rounds in celebration but... stupid twat had his gun the wrong way round. Oh, they don't make 'em like Great Uncle Susan anymore.
That's marvellous stuff Eddie, but, what the fuck's it got to do with anything?
Hey! What about plastic surgery?
It's a cracking idea!
Right! I'll go get a plastic knife.

[attempting to turn on TV with 'remote control']
Why isn't it working?
Because that's not a remote control television. And that's a packet of chocolate bourbon biscuits.

[Throws biscuits]
Fucking pensioners!
[while pretending to tap out morse code on a radiator]
[mouthing to audience]
I don't know what the fuck I'm doing!
